nodes.text: Battle of the Dernatine system  (Mandalorian Wars)

Sometime between 3973 BBY and 3965 BBY, during the early years of the conflict known as the Mandalorian Wars, the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders raided the Dernatine system, a star system in Hutt Space. The Mandalorians were victorious in the raid, and later used the system as a staging point for part of the campaign known as the Mandalorian Triumph in 3962 BBY.
The battle is only referenced once in The Essential Atlas. It was marked on the galactic map showing the battles of the Mandalorian Wars rather than described in prose.
